Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
GameManager
public class GameManager extends Object
Contains the logic for all game mechanics, including the interaction between the player and the enemies.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameManager()
    Initializes Game Manager fields

    Method
    Description
    void
    checkAndSpawnNewFleet()
    Spawns a full new fleet of enemies if no enemies remain on the screen.

  • Method Details

    • createEnemyFleet

      public void createEnemyFleet()
      Creates a full fleet of enemies in their initial positions.

    • getPlayerXPosition

      public double getPlayerXPosition()
      Gets the horizontal position of the player.
      Returns:
      double value indicating the player's x position

    • getPlayerYPosition

      public double getPlayerYPosition()
      Gets the vertical position of the player.
      Returns:
      double value indicating the player's y position

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the game logic to reflect collisions, diving enemies, newly spawned enemies, and missiles shot by the player and by the enemies. Removes game objects when necessary.

    • enemyShootMissile

      public void enemyShootMissile()
      Chooses when diving enemies shoot towards the player. Uses a random number generator and a threshold to make the decision.

    • maybeTriggerDive

      public void maybeTriggerDive()
      Chooses when an enemy leaves the formation and dives towards the player.

    • render

      public void render()
      Removes nodes from the GUI to reflect the game's inner state.

    • getGameObjects

      public List<Node> getGameObjects()
      Puts together a list of all graphical game elements that will be added to the root pane.
      Returns:
      List of nodes to be added to the GUI

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      Gets the score of the game.
      Returns:
      Integer representing the score

    • getLives

      public int getLives()
      Gets the number of lives remaining.
      Returns:
      Integer representing the number of lives remaining.

    • getPlayer

      Gets the current instance of the player.

      Player object

    • getMissiles

      public List<Missile> getMissiles()
      Gets the list of all missiles active.
      Returns:
      List of missiles in play

    • checkAndSpawnNewFleet

      public void checkAndSpawnNewFleet()
      Spawns a full new fleet of enemies if no enemies remain on the screen.
